author: smuzaffar
body:
Some Relvals are failing in [CMSSW_14_2_ASNEEDED_X](https://cmssdt.cern.ch/SDT/html/cmssdt-ib/#/relVal/CMSSW_14_2/2024-11-11-1100?selectedArchs=el8_amd64_gcc12&selectedFlavors=ASNEEDED_X&selectedStatus=failed) IBs. Running these relfals locally print error like [a]. This PR makes sure that LHAPDF/pythia6 libs are linked and loaded at runtime. Thes elibs provide the PDFSET symbol.


[a]
```
1****************** PYINIT: initialization of PYTHIA routines *****************
 Error: you did not link PDFLIB correctly.
 Dummy routine PDFSET in PYTHIA file called instead.
 Execution stopped!

     PYSTOP called with code:    5
```
title: Do not merge] Fix for asneeded IBs, force link pythia6/lhapdf libs
